publications.name: Enhancing Image Caption Generation Through Context-Aware Attention Mechanism
publications.summary: This paper demonstrates the superiority of incorporating ResNet-50 and a context-aware attention network over the conventional encoder-decoder architecture in Bangla image captioning.

publications.name: A Text-Enhanced Multimodal Fusion Network for Disaster Response
publications.summary: Proposes a multimodal architecture combining ResNet50 and a multi-head attention-based transformer (BERT) model for classifying damage-related posts using visual and textual information.

projects.name: News Classifier
projects.summary: Implemented Naive Bayes algorithm and LSTM for detecting fake news from the Twitter dataset of the USA Presidential Election 2020.

projects.name: Indian Food Image Classifications
projects.summary: Implemented a custom CNN and pre-trained models (VGG16, InceptionResNetV2) for food image classification.
